name: Electronic Super Joy 2: Gold Edition
summary: Do you want the Gold Edition Experience? Do you want to support the developers & musicians of this game? Then buy the GOLD EDITION! 3 new levels, Boss Fight, New Ability, Bonus Music, full game soundtrack of 43 songs, 3 Full-sized HD Digital Posters, and Behind The Scenes developer sketches + in-progress screenshots & GIFs.
